Greece continued their legacy before the torch passed to Rome and finally to the Germanic world. The Greek alphabet is derived from Phoenician which is a Semitic alphabet from Lebanon that was itself derived from Egyptian hieroglyphs... from... Northern Africa... So, yeah.
